code: import React from'react';import'../../styles/GameSection.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GameSection=_ref=>{let{id,name,turn,created_at}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gameSection",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gameSection__number",children:id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gameSection__string",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gameSection__string",children:["\u0425\u043E\u0434: ",turn]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gameSection__string",children:["\u0414\u0430\u0442\u0430: ",created_at.split("T")[0]," \u0412\u0440\u0435\u043C\u044F ",created_at.split("T")[1].split('.')[0]]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"gameSection__button",onClick:()=>navigate("/room/".concat(id)),children:"\u0421\u0442\u0430\u0440\u0442"})]});};export default GameSection;
